title.rendered: Linz Airport (blue danube airport linz) in Horsching, Austria

content.rendered:
Linz Airport (blue danube airport linz) in Horsching, Austria Address / Phone / Email / Location / Website

Address : Flughafen Linz GesmbH
Flughafenstrabe 1
A-4063 Horsching

Phone : 0043 (0) 7221 600 0, Pabenger Service: 0043 7221 600 1101
Fax: 0043 (0) 7221 600 100

Email id: info@linz-airport.com
Pabenger information Service: psc@linz-airport.com

Hours: Mon – Fri: 5.30 a.m. – 11.00 p.m.
Sat and holidays: 10.00 a.m. – 5.00 p.m.
Sun: 10.00 a.m. – 11.00 p.m.

Linz Airport (blue danube airport linz) Official website: http://www.linz-airport.com/en

Direction: View direction here

IATA code: LNZ

ICAO code: LOWL

List of Airports in Austria

Services / Facilities at Linz Airport (blue danube airport linz)

  • WiFi
  • VIP-Lounge
  • Access Fastlane
  • Baby Changing Facilities
  • Car Services
  • Charging Station

Car Rental – Linz Airport

Car rental office location: Main Car Park 1

Avis
Phone : 0043 7221 600 6300, 0043 7221 600 6301
Email: linz@avis.at

Budget
Phone : 0043 7221 600 6300
Email: reservation@budget.at

Europcar Austria
Phone : Airport station: 0043 1 866 16 40
Contact for corporate customers: 0043 1 866 16 606
Email: linz@europcar.at

Hertz Rienhoff GmbH
Phone : 0043 732 784841
Email: linz@hertz.at

Sixt
Phone : 0043 810 977424
Email: ap636@sixt.com

ecar-rent
Phone : +43 316 232085
Email: info@ecar-rent.com
